page.title: 06TRADE IN BRAMSHAW AREA
page.content: There is relatively little trade as the area is predominantly rural. The following amenities exist. HOTELS. 2 hotels offering accomodation, drinks & meals. One pub offering drinks & meals. Private houses offering Bed & Breakfast. SHOPS & GARAGES. PO with general store; Shop at Bramshaw golf club selling golf articles; one plumber; 2 garages selling petrol & doing repairs; one car driving school. DOOR TO DOOR TRADE. Milk doorstep deliveries. 2 firms supply milk & a small range of other food. One milkman delivers only 3 times a week.Travelling shops call at houses. Individual houses & farms sell fresh eggs, vegetables & fruit. FORESTRY COMMISSION SALES. Growing & selling of conifers.
